Emoji: Toolbar button tooltip for the Emoji feature.
Dropdown option label for opening an emoji picker offering more results to choose from.
Skin tone toolbar: A label used by assistive technologies describing the emoji feature skin tone dropdown.
Find an emoji (min. 2 characters): Label of an input field for filtering an emoji collection by the typed value.
The main text of the message shown to the user when no emoji are available for the search criteria.
